Sentencas: This paper presents a techno-economic analysis of biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems for combined heat and power (CHP) applications in wastewater treatment facilities (WWTFs).
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: SOFC-CHP systems ranging from 300 kWe to 6 MWe in electric power capacity are explored in terms of their performance and life cycle costs.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: Representative biogas feedstock is established from compositional data for a large wastewater reclamation facility in Denver, Colorado.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: A steady-state SOFC-CHP system model is developed with Aspen Plus for the integration with small (640 kW(LHV)), medium (2.97 MWLHV) and large (11.92 MWLHV) biogas sources.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The proposed SOFC system concept includes anode gas recirculation, a biogas pretreatment system, and a waste heat recovery unit.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The system offers a net electrical efficiency of 51.6% LHV and a net CHP efficiency of 87.5% LHV.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The effect of operating parameters on system efficiency is investigated with a parametric study.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The economic performance is evaluated with the levelized costs of electricity (COE) and heat (COH).
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The results are compared with the COE from reciprocating engine, gas turbine, microturbine, molten carbonate fuel cell technologies, and grid electricity prices.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities

Sentencas: The influence of economic parameters and stack operating parameters on the levelized COE is also presented.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities
Techno-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell-based combined heat and power systems for biogas utilization at wastewater treatment facilities
